channel.title: Emulator on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Emulator on Arrans github.io

item.title: jaromaz/MacintoshPi
item.description: MacintoshPi is a project that allows running full-screen versions of Apple’s Mac OS 7, Mac OS 8 and Mac OS 9 with sound, active online connection and modem emulation under Raspberry Pi.

item.title: ruffle-rs/ruffle
item.description: A Flash Player emulator written in Rust

item.title: maxpoletaev/dendy
item.description: NES/Famicom emulator with P2P network multiplayer and WASM support

item.title: krocki/gb
item.description: A minimal C implementation of Nintendo Gameboy - An fast research environment for Reinforcement Learning
